item.title: Analyzing arguments during a debate using NLP in Python - PyCon India 2015
item.description:
Description

Speaker: Abhinav Gupta

This talk will guide you through the application of Python NLP Techniques to analyze arguments during a debate and define a strategy to figure out the winner of the debate on the basis of strength and relevance of the arguments.

Details: https://in.pycon.org/cfp/pycon-india-2015/proposals/analyzing-arguments-during-a-debate-using-natural-language-processing-in-python/
item.dc:creator: Abhinav Gupta
